shi්ra lankawata thewana naya warikayada labadimata jathyanthara mulya aramudala eeye thiranaya kala.ee amerikanu dolar miliyana 407.8k.palamu saha dewana naya warika pasugiya kalayedi jathyanthara mulya aramudala wisin labadi thibenawa.shi්ra lankawe wathman aarthika thaththwaya pilibandawa sahimakata path wiya haki bawin naya mudala muda harimatayi jathyanthara mulya aramudala thiranaya kara aththe.aramudala wisin shi්ra lankawata labadena sampurna naya mudala amerikanu dolar biliyana 2.6k.

mama mage adahas prakasha kirimata fesbuk yodagath pamanin mama siyalla mehi liya thabanawayayi kima wihiluwaki.siyalla liyu kalhi siyallanta siyalla nathiwimatada puluwana.eheth mama kiyana de ho mama sithana de mama fesbuk hi satahan kara athnam ee aniwaryayenma mata paudgalika hangimak wu pamanin eya sangawiya yuthu nathayi mama tharaye sithana nisaya.mama kawiyak ho adahasak liyu pamanin ee mage jiwithaya ho ee mage paudgalika athdakimak lesa sithima itha anathurudayaka wiya haka.eheth mata danena de thawath boho denekuta wada thiwra lesa danethayi ma sithana nisawen ee sahruda hangimen ma liya thabu satahan bohomayak thibena mama piliganimi.

janadhipathiwarana prathipalaya nikuth wu rathriye kumanthranayak pawathi bawata nagena chodana menma thamanta ho pawule ayata sangawu wathkam thibena bawata nagena chodana hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha wisin digin digatama prathikshepa kota thibe.

dina 14 k athulatha adala wandi mudala nogewuwahoth nithimaya piyawara ganna bawada mehidi danwa atha.
